p: The algorithm GARP [ 47] was used to model the ecological niche of L. intermedia ( s.l.)Â to help compare our findings with those of Peterson & Shaw [ 16]. GARP is a genetic algorithm based on a series of classificatory rules that are developed according to relationships between predictive variables and species occurrences. The various rules 'evolve' in a process analogous to natural selection, and they are excluded or selected to maximise predictability [ 46].
